title: 服务端崩溃
txt_content:
03.04 21:02:51 [Server] INFO Unable to allocate 132096KB bitmaps for parallel garbage collection for the requested 4227072KB heap.
03.04 21:02:51 [Server] INFO Error occurred during initialization of VM
03.04 21:02:50 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "MCPC+1.7.10(支持MOD+插件)"

replies.author: 纯在感
replies.txt_content: 服务器内存调大一些,不行的话再试试换下开服器{:10_523:}
